definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.chinese: 浏览网上自由译者布告栏。

sentences.english: Counseling or interjecting personal opinion is never permitted.
sentences.chinese: 翻译过程中不许掺杂译者的个人观点在内。

sentences.english: Regardless of the translator adopts what law, translates the ideal film title as far as possible.
sentences.chinese: 译者无论采取何法，尽可能翻译出理想的片名。

sentences.english: When translating the source poem, the translator employs the iconic forms to render the iconicity of the source poem.
sentences.chinese: 译者在译原诗时要使用象似形式体现象似性。

sentences.english: Digital Image Processing, second edition, by Gonzalez & Woods.
sentences.chinese: 数位影像处理，译者，徐晓佩，高立出版社。

sentences.english: I think one of the biggest challenges most translators face is finding work.
sentences.chinese: 我想对于大部分翻译者来说最大的挑战之一是找工作。

sentences.english: A translator must be well acquainted with the target language.
sentences.chinese: 一个好的译者必须很熟悉目标语言。

sentences.english: I somewhat identify with these young translators.
sentences.chinese: 对这些年轻的译者，我有几分认同。

sentences.english: Tanslated by Zhu Xiaoxing. Whoever wants to quote it should note the translator and where the translation is from.
sentences.chinese: 本文由朱晓星译出，如要转引，请注明译者及出处。

sentences.english: One of the TF2 wiki Traditional Chinese translator.
sentences.chinese: 一个TF2维基繁体中文翻译者。

sentences.english: I am a translator, currently in China researching contemporary literature.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个译者，目前正在中国研究当代文学。

sentences.english: The proposal of the translator's pre-understanding provides a new perspective for translation criticism.
sentences.chinese: 分析译者的前理解因素为翻译评论提供了新的视角。

sentences.english: It also depends on translators' creativeness and imaginativeness.
sentences.chinese: 还需要译者的创造性及想象力。

sentences.english: Leila: The project started off with volunteer translators from around the world.
sentences.chinese: 项目开始于世界各地的志愿翻译者。

sentences.english: The third chapter introduces the particular objective in this thesis, Fu Sheng Liu Ji, and its individual translators.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分介绍了《浮生六记》及其两种英译本的译者。

sentences.english: The image of the translator exists in the poetic target language.
sentences.chinese: 译者的形象伴随着诗化的译语而存在。
